text: Baram te'om, yijane prthiraika basabasa karaara upayogi karaiche arau iyara maje maje nada-nadi prabahita karaiche, arau iyata sthapana karaiche sudrrha parbata lagate du'i sagarara majata srsti karaiche antaraaya, (tente koraacona) allahara lagata ana kono ilaha achene, baram sihamtara adhikansa'i najane
